name: places/ChIJlR9buqhZwokRwpPv7rMO6hE
formattedAddress: 545 W 45th St 11th Floor, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 545 W 45th St 11th Floor, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: I started using this lab 2 years when they had an Itero promotion. I had some bad experiences with other labs and kept going back to Glidewell because while they weren't the best they were consistent. So now I start using Creodent because of this promotion and my thoughts are this will just be OK, and I'll just use them for posterior crowns because the quality will not be very good. I was dead wrong!!! They are great!!! Sure we had a learning curve and we had to learn what the other wanted but they have been super nice and the work is really nice and fits really well. Much of it may be due to the Itero but I love the consistency and the customer service. I don't know who the other dentists are referring too but I have never dealt with any unpleasant people there and whenever I need help with a complicated case they always direct me to the right person. Do we have the occasional hiccup, sure  we do, like all doctor- lab relationships. But one call and its resolved. I did have the occasional delivery issue as another doctor mentioned but that's not the lab. Can't blame Amazon if UPS screws up the delivery. But they handled it fast and with no drama. I deal with Danny (the manager) a lot and we have a great relationship. I'm not afraid to tell him that something is not to my liking and he is not afraid to tell me that my prep needs work. I value that type of relationship and even when this promotion is over (in a few months), there is no reason for me to switch labs. They are on top of their game in terms of tech and they deliver really nice work from anterior crowns to implants to removable. Very pleased and see myself with them for many years to come.

originalText.text: I've used this lab for many years. They are great with implant restorations (both with custom abutments/cementable and screw-retained), all ceramic restorations, metal ceramic - regardless of whether the impression is digital or old-school. The staff is courteous and the technicians are ready to help without being overbearing. I purchased 2 Medit scanners from them a couple of years ago and have been very happy with them and the support from the lab.

text.text: I've used this lab for many years. They are great with implant restorations (both with custom abutments/cementable and screw-retained), all ceramic restorations, metal ceramic - regardless of whether the impression is digital or old-school. The staff is courteous and the technicians are ready to help without being overbearing. I purchased 2 Medit scanners from them a couple of years ago and have been very happy with them and the support from the lab.

originalText.text:
I wish I could give them a negative star. I never write a bad review, always give businesses benefit of the doubt before judging them. The experience I've had with this lab has forced me to voice my strong opinion about them. First of all, the customer service does not exists. If you are a dentist and reading this, please just stay away from this lab.
They are horrible at delivering cases and so is their service they use for deliveries, Speedy Delivery. Creo dental nor Speedy Delivery take any responsibility for anything. There is never a follow up with a phone call if the case is going to be delayed. We have been told multiple times the case is on the way just to find out it either got lost or the shipment is delayed.
Which is fine, things happen. But they don't even have the courtesy to call us to inform us. When you call to check the status, you get a very simple "I don't know".  Not even a "sorry".

Again, I completely understand that things happen. But my only complain is that, take some responsibility and at least have decency to inform your customers when and if the shipment is going to be delayed.

originalText.text: I've been using Creo Dental for over 20 years . I am very pleased with the service and quality of this lab!! I have even sent patients over for personalized attention. I appreciate their fine attention to detail and their communication is excellent. I'd highly recommend this lab!

originalText.text:
We have worked with Creo for a number of years and have had amazing results.  They are kind, courteous, and are always willing to accommodate us. They certainly have my recommendation and I am looking forward to continue to work with them in the future. Thank you guys!
Dr. Shariff
